title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: This should at a maximum only be one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add the following line to StyledText performPaint method: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Perform a text change or append N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
